Question.Subject: Mozilla Firefox Won't Open?
Question.Content:
My firefox was not responding so I closed it and now when I try to open it this comes up:
XML Parsing Error: undefined entity Location: chrome://browser/content/browser.xul <key id="manBookmarkKb" key="&bookmarksCmd.commandkey;" command="Browser:ShowAllBookmarks" modifiers="accel,shift"/> ----^
and that's it.
What can I do to fix it? I'm only on the internet now because I am using Internet Explorer. Please help! Thanks!
Question.ChosenAnswer: Try reinstall it it should fixed it, or you should use google chrome or ie8.

Answer.Content:
the only thing u can do to fix it is take antidepressants
wheeee!
Try to uninstall FireFox and download it again from monzilla.com
Try reinstall it it should fixed it, or you should use google chrome or ie8.
Use Safari A whole lot faster than Firefox. http://www.apple.com/safari/
